message:
Kick enemies before performing a backflip to dodge their attacks. Then, charge forward to counterattack with your spear. Deals Critical Damage to enemies who've had their Weak Spots revealed. 
#yPhysical Damage: {0}% + {1}
Invincibility: {2} sec

#wWhen attacking an enemy with a Weak Spot:
#yAdditional Damage: {3}%
Kicks and launches the enemy into the air

Charge forward and sweep enemies into the air, creating a shockwave. Press the #yregular attack button#w to immediately activate the sweep. The shockwave's damage depends on the length of your charge. 
#yPhysical Damage: {0}% + {1}
If you cancel while charging, Damage: {2}%
Damage per hit while charging: {3}% (up to 8 hits)
Enhances #yForceful Bounce#w by increasing its damage and the range of its last hit.\n#yForceful Bounce Damage: +30%

Enhances #yStab Tug#w by increasing its range and reducing the Critical Resist of attacked enemies. Additional stabs deal more Super Armor Damage to enemies.
#yStab Tug Damage: +{0}%
Increases Super Armor Damage to center
Enemy Critical Resist: -{1}%
Duration: {2} sec

Enhances #ySpinning Takedown#w to further increase its damage based on how long you charge energy for. Press the #yspecial attack button#w while charging to launch enemies.

(1st Charge)
#y{0}% of Spinning Takedown Damage

#w(2nd Charge)
#y{1}% of Spinning Takedown Damage
Enhances #yTwirling Thrust#w to deal 2 additional thrusts. Reduces the skill's cooldown by 5 seconds during the last thrust and increases the attack range of the final thrust.
Grants a #y{0}%#w chance to expose the weaknesses of an attacked enemy for #y{1} sec#w.

Enhances #yCharging Sweep#w to increase its charging distance and activate an additional shockwave.

When canceled within {0}m:
#yShockwave Damage: {1}%

#wWhen canceled within {2}m:
#yShockwave Damage: {3}%

#wWhen canceled at the max distance:
#yShockwave Damage: {4}%
